verses.verse: Now Abraham <WH85> took <WH3947> another <WH3254> wife, <WH802> whose name <WH8034> was Keturah. <WH6989>
And she bore <WH3205> to him Zimran <WH2175> and Jokshan <WH3370> and Medan <WH4091> and Midian <WH4080> and Ishbak <WH3435> and Shuah. <WH7774>

And Jokshan <WH3370> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Sheba <WH7614> and Dedan. <WH1719> And the sons <WH1121> of Dedan <WH1719> were Asshurim <WH9037> and Letushim <WH3912> and Leummim. <WH3817>

And the sons <WH1121> of Midian <WH4080> [were] Ephah <WH5891> and Epher <WH6081> and Hanoch <WH2585> and Abida <WH28> and Eldaah. <WH420> All <WH3605> these <WH428> [were] the sons <WH1121> of Keturah. <WH6989>
Now Abraham <WH85> gave <WH5414> all <WH3605> that he had to Isaac; <WH3327>

but to the sons <WH1121> of his concubines, <WH6370> Abraham <WH85> gave <WH5414> gifts <WH4979> while he was still <WH5750> living, <WH2416> and sent <WH7971> them away <WH7971> from his son <WH1121> Isaac <WH3327> eastward, <WH9506> to the land <WH776> of the east. <WH6924>
And these <WH428> are all <WH3117> the years <WH8141> of Abraham's life <WH9132> that he lived, <WH2421> one hundred <WH3967> and seventy-five years. <WH8141>

And Abraham <WH85> breathed <WH1478> his last <WH1478> and died <WH4191> in a ripe <WH2896> old <WH7872> age, <WH7872> an old <WH2205> man <WH2205> and satisfied <WH7649> [with life;] and he was gathered <WH622> to his people. <WH9415>

Then his sons <WH1121> Isaac <WH3327> and Ishmael <WH3458> buried <WH6912> him in the cave <WH4631> of Machpelah, <WH4375> in the field <WH7704> of Ephron <WH6085> the son <WH1121> of Zohar <WH6714> the Hittite, <WH2850> facing <WH5921> <WH6440> Mamre, <WH4471>
the field <WH7704> which <WH834> Abraham <WH85> purchased <WH7069> from the sons <WH1121> of Heth; <WH2845> there <WH8033> Abraham <WH85> was buried <WH6912> with Sarah <WH8283> his wife. <WH802>
And it came <WH1961> about after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of Abraham, <WH85> that God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> his son <WH1121> Isaac; <WH3327> and Isaac <WH3327> lived <WH3427> by Beer-lahai-roi.

Now these <WH428> are [the records of] the generations <WH8435> of Ishmael, <WH3458> Abraham <WH85>'s son, <WH1121> whom <WH834> Hagar <WH1904> the Egyptian, <WH4713> Sarah's maid, <WH8198> bore <WH3205> to Abraham;

and these <WH428> are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Ishmael, <WH3458> by their names, <WH8034> in the order <WH8435> of their birth: <WH8435> Nebaioth, <WH5032> the first-born of Ishmael, <WH3458> and Kedar <WH6938> and Adbeel <WH110> and Mibsam <WH4017>
and Mishma <WH4927> and Dumah <WH1746> and Massa, <WH4854>
Hadad <WH2301> and Tema, <WH8485> Jetur, <WH3195> Naphish <WH5305> and Kedemah. <WH6929>

These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Ishmael <WH3458> and these <WH428> are their names, <WH8034> by their villages, <WH9161> and by their camps; <WH2918> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> princes <WH5387> according to their tribes. <WH523>

And these <WH428> are the years <WH8141> of the life <WH9132> of Ishmael, <WH3458> one hundred <WH3967> and thirty-seven years; <WH8141> and he breathed <WH1478> his last <WH1478> and died, <WH4191> and was gathered <WH622> to his people. <WH9415>

And they settled <WH7931> from Havilah <WH2341> to Shur <WH7793> which <WH834> is east <WH5921> <WH6440> of Egypt <WH4714> as one goes <WH935> toward Assyria; <WH804> he settled <WH5307> in defiance <WH5921> <WH6440> of all <WH3605> his relatives. <WH251>
Now these <WH428> are [the records of] the generations <WH8435> of Isaac, <WH3327> Abraham <WH85>'s son: <WH1121> Abraham became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Isaac; <WH3327>

and Isaac <WH3327> was forty <WH705> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he took <WH3947> Rebekah, <WH7259> the daughter <WH1323> of Bethuel <WH1328> the Aramean <WH761> of Paddan-aram, the sister <WH269> of Laban <WH3837> the Aramean, <WH761> to be his wife. <WH802>

And Isaac <WH3327> prayed <WH6279> to the Lord <WH3068> on behalf <WH5227> of his wife, <WH802> because <WH3588> she was barren; <WH6135> and the Lord <WH3068> answered <WH6279> him and Rebekah <WH7259> his wife <WH802> conceived. <WH2029>

But the children <WH1121> struggled <WH7533> together within <WH7130> her; and she said, <WH559> "If <WH518> it is so, <WH3651> why <WH4100> then am I [this way?]" So she went <WH1980> to inquire <WH1875> of the Lord. <WH3068>

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to her, "Two <WH8147> nations <WH1471> are in your womb; <WH990> And two <WH8147> peoples <WH3816> shall be separated <WH6504> from your body; <WH4578> And one people <WH3816> shall be stronger <WH553> than <WH4480> the other; <WH3816> And the older <WH7227> shall serve <WH5647> the younger. <WH6810>"
When her days <WH3117> to be delivered <WH3205> were fulfilled, <WH4390> behold, <WH2009> there were twins <WH9639> in her womb. <WH990>
Now the first <WH7223> came <WH3318> forth <WH3318> red, <WH132> all <WH3605> over like a hairy <WH8181> garment; <WH155> and they named <WH7121> <WH8034> him Esau. <WH6215>

And afterward <WH310> <WH3651> his brother <WH251> came <WH3318> forth <WH3318> with his hand <WH3027> holding <WH270> on to Esau's heel, <WH6119> so his name <WH8034> was called <WH7121> Jacob; <WH3290> and Isaac <WH3327> was sixty <WH8346> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when she gave <WH3205> birth <WH3205> to them.

When the boys <WH5288> grew <WH1431> up, Esau <WH6215> became <WH1961> a skillful <WH3045> hunter, <WH376> <WH6718> a man <WH376> of the field; <WH7704> but Jacob <WH3290> was a peaceful <WH8535> man, <WH376> living <WH3427> in tents. <WH168>
Now Isaac <WH3327> loved <WH157> Esau, <WH6215> because <WH3588> he had a taste <WH6310> for game; <WH6718> but Rebekah <WH7259> loved <WH157> Jacob. <WH3290>
And when Jacob <WH3290> had cooked <WH2102> stew, <WH5138> Esau <WH6215> came <WH935> in from the field <WH7704> and he was famished; <WH5889>

and Esau <WH6215> said <WH559> to Jacob, <WH3290> "Please <WH4994> let me have <WH3938> a swallow <WH3938> of that red <WH122> stuff <WH123> there, for I am famished. <WH5889>" Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> his name <WH8034> was called <WH7121> Edom. <WH9000>
But Jacob <WH3290> said, <WH559> "First <WH3117> sell <WH4376> me your birthright. <WH1062>"
And Esau <WH6215> said, <WH559> "Behold, <WH2009> I am <WH1980> about <WH1980> to die; <WH4191> so of what <WH4100> [use] then is the birthright <WH1062> to me?"
And Jacob <WH3290> said, <WH559> "First <WH3117> swear <WH7650> to me"; so he swore <WH7650> to him, and sold <WH4376> his birthright <WH1062> to Jacob. <WH3290>

Then Jacob <WH3290> gave <WH5414> Esau <WH6215> bread <WH3899> and lentil <WH5742> stew; <WH5138> and he ate <WH398> and drank, <WH8354> and rose <WH6965> and went <WH1980> on his way. <WH1980> Thus Esau <WH6215> despised <WH959> his birthright. <WH1062>
